title: Ep 282 | How Phil Robertson Changed a Former Left-Winger's Life
description:
The guys are joined by John Kerr, a quintessential mainstream media guy who was baptized by Phil after writing him a letter from "a former left-winger." Jase tries to understand the media's agenda and what the solution is. Al highlights the media's renewed attempt to cancel the Promise Keepers. Phil talks about how the Gospel transcends political wings (and Jase is thrilled to hear him come to that conclusion). And the guys unite around one message: Jesus is for everybody.
